TopicTitle: MacGameStore - how to update to latest version

Articles.Content:
Hello, 

I've bought KSP sometime ago there. I got once an update to newer version of KSP. But current version there is: 1.3.0.

But as far as I know there is already a newer version for some time now. How can I update my KSP to current one? 

 

Thanks!
Either by switching to the Steam version or by asking that store why they still don't have the most recent version.
